```r
removing_outliers_df <- remove_bad_days_df %>%
  
  mutate(avg_systolic = mean(Systolic),
            sd_systolic = sd(Systolic)) %>%
  mutate(outlier = ifelse(abs(Systolic - avg_systolic) >= sd_systolic, T, F)) %>%
  filter(!outlier)


df1 <- removing_outliers_df %>% 
  summarize(`Average Systolic BP` = mean(Systolic), 
            new_sd_systolic = sd(Systolic))

ggplot(df1, aes(x = Date, y = `Average Systolic BP`, color = `Specimen Name`)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=`Average Systolic BP`-new_sd_systolic, ymax=`Average Systolic BP`+new_sd_systolic), width=.2,
                 position=position_dodge(0.01))+
   theme_classic() +
  ggtitle(\Tail-cuff measurements of Systolic BP\n\")
